frameDefinitions: An Agent performs some Action which is considered imprudent.
A Gambler commits an Asset to a prediction that an Uncertain_situation will have a particular Outcome (or class of outcomes).
A Protagonist is described as being exposed to a potentially dangerous situation that may end in a Bad_outcome for him- or herself.
An Asset is in a state where it is exposed to or otherwise liable to be affected by a Harmful_event, which may be metonymically evoked by reference to a Dangerous_entity.
This frame characterizes the likelihood that a Hypothetical_event will happen as a position on a scale of impossible to inevitable.
One phenomenon, the Predictive_phenomenon is an indication of the future or current (but still uncertain) existence of another phenomenon, the Future_phenomenon.
frameExamples: If you are a farmer, you are at <t>risk</t> for hearing loss caused by noise exposure in your work.
listRoleDefinitions: The individual that performs the <fen>Action</fen>, resulting in danger to themself.
This role denotes the <fen>Action</fen> taken by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Agent</fen> dares to perform the <fen>Action</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> risks doing the <fen>Action</fen>.
The person who wages the <fen>Asset</fen> on a certain Outcome.
Something desirable possessed by or directly associated with the <fen>Gambler</fen> which is lost if the <fen>Gambler</fen> loses the wager.
The <fen>Gambler</fen> predicts that a certain <fen>Outcome</fen> will hold.
The <fen>Gambler</fen> predicts how an <fen>Uncertain_situation</fen> will resolve.
The time when the <fen>Gambler</fen> makes the wager.
The place where the <fen>Gambler</fen> makes the wager.
The person who is at risk of some <fen>Bad_outcome</fen>
A situation that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> would like to avoid.
Something desirable possessed by or directly associated with the <fen>Protagonist</fen> which might be lost or damaged.
The <fen>Action</fen> that creates the risk.
The time when the risk pertains.
The place where there is risk.
Something judged to be desirable or valuable which might be lost or damaged.
An action that may occur or a state which may hold which could result in the loss of or damage to the <fen>Asset</fen>.
A concrete or abstract entity which may come to cause the loss of, or damage to the <fen>Asset</fen> either due to its participation in a <fen>Harmful_event</fen>.
The time period during which the <fen>Asset</fen> enjoys  the specified level of security from a <fen>Harmful_event</fen>.

A particular location in which the <fen>Asset</fen> is secure. Frequently, it is to be inferred that the characteristics of the location protect the <fen>Asset</fen> from a potential <fen>Harmful_event</fen>.
A numerical representation of the probability that a Hypothetical_event will occur.
A metaphorical representation of the position on the scale of likelihood that the Hypothetical_event will occur.
The event that is expected to happen with a certain likelihood.
<fen>Predictive_phenomenon</fen> provides evidence for the existence or the nature of the <fen>Outcome</fen> of <fen>Future_phenomenon</fen>.
<fen>Future_phenomenon</fen> is that phenomenon that is predicted to occur or have a particular quality.
The role <fen>Outcome</fen> identifies those expressions that indicate how the <fen>Future_phenomenon</fen> is expected to turn out based on the evidence of the <fen>Predictive_phenomenon</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the omen is occuring.
The location where something good or bad might occur.
listRoleExamples: I do n't think <fex>you</fex> should hazard the ascent in the dark , that 's all .
I chanced <fex>a peek at myself</fex>.
<fex>At dawn</fex>, the Captain chanced opening the hatch.
<fex>Back in his room</fex>, he risked peeking inside.
There was no risk <fex>of his returning</fex>.
The risk <fex>to his reputation</fex> was significant.
<fex>Implementing this program</fex> runs the risk of offending our core constituents.
<fex>Even after the end of Apartheit</fex> we still run the risk of letting racism continue forever.
There is always some danger to rich men <fex>in a bar like this</fex>.
There is a locked padlock that guarantees <fex>the information</fex> is secure.
Our system ensures that information stored within hardware is secure <fex>from external software attack and physical theft</fex>.
We make sure your BMW is secure <fex>against intruders</fex>.

Israel is insecure <fex>today</fex> not because it does
not have enough military power.
Workers need to make sure their property is secure <fex>at work</fex>.
There's a <fex>95 %</fex> chance of rain today.
Chances are <fex>slim</fex> that he'll pull through.
He's got a small chance <fex>of making it out alive</fex>.
<fex>To achieve so much this year</fex> augurs well for the future.
This move presages <fex>a freeze on the granting of new concessions</fex>.
It all bodes <fex>well</fex> for the future.
The storm bodes ill for you <fex>here</fex> .

sourceCandidateSpans.text: Waking Up Wally: The Walter Gretzky Story
